changeSet.id: 20190606 remove schema_version if exists and is empty
changeSet.author: Jon-Eirik Pettersen
changeSet.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS schema_version;

changeSet.id: 20190606 migrate flyway migration table to liquibase
changeSet.author: Jon-Eirik Pettersen
changeSet.sql:
INSERT INTO databasechangelog (id,author,filename,dateexecuted,orderexecuted,exectype,md5sum) SELECT '20190605 v1 create subject table', 'Migrated From Flyway', 'db-migrate-from-flyway.xml', installed_on, 1, 'EXECUTED', '7:18dd197f61f9b7051fc43548d30cee3e' FROM schema_version WHERE version = '1' AND checksum = -1254755710;
DELETE FROM schema_version WHERE version = '1' AND checksum = -1254755710;
